QuestData.Title: The Scryer's Dilemma
QuestData.Description: Since you were so helpful at the mines, would you be willing to help us with a small problem here at the temple?$B$BWise Mari has been complaining recently of a disturbance in his temple.$B$BThe water elementals have gotten quite playful recently, and made off with his ceremonial staff.$B$BIf you could help him, I would be most grateful. I may even put in a word with the Jade Serpent for you.$B$BJust follow the path to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Water Fiends to recover Wise Mari's Staff.
QuestData.CompletionText: The pools are clouded. I will need my staff to calm the spirits and speak to the water.
QuestData.RewardText: I am but an old jinyu, and those pesky water sprites were impossible to catch. Thank you, $n, for returning my staff to me.
